name: Jan Botha
body:
## Publications (see also [Google Scholar page](https://scholar.google.co.uk/citations?user=EklJdhYAAAAJ&hl=en)) **[Compositional Morphology for Word Representations and Language Modelling](http://jmlr.org/proceedings/papers/v32/botha14.pdf)**
J.A. Botha and P. Blunsom
In *Proceedings of the 31st International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML)*, Beijing, China, 2014.
\*Award for [best application paper](http://icml.cc/2014/index/article/26.htm)\* \| [slides](https://github.com/bothameister/bothameister.github.io/raw/master/icml2014-slides-web.pdf) \| [talk](http://techtalks.tv/talks/compositional-morphology-for-word-representations-and-language-modelling/60990/) \| [poster](https://github.com/bothameister/bothameister.github.io/raw/master/icml14-poster.pdf) **[Adaptor Grammars for Learning Non-Concatenative Morphology](http://www.aclweb.org/anthology/D/D13/D13-1034.pdf)**
J.A. Botha and P. Blunsom
In *Proceedings of the Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*, Seattle, Washington, USA, 2013.
[slides](https://github.com/bothameister/bothameister.github.io/raw/master/emnlp13-slides.pdf) \| [code](https://github.com/bothameister/py-srcag) **[Bayesian Language Modelling of German Compounds](http://anthology.aclweb.org/C/C12/C12-1022.pdf)**
J.A. Botha, C. Dyer, P. Blunsom
In *Proceedings of the International Conference on Computational Linguistics (COLING)*, Mumbai, India, 2012.
[slides](https://github.com/bothameister/bothameister.github.io/raw/master/coling12-slides.pdf) **[Hierarchical Bayesian Language Modelling for the Linguistically Informed](http://www.anthology.aclweb.org/E/E12/E12-3008.pdf)**
J.A. Botha
In *Proceedings of the EACL 2012 Student Research Workshop*, Avignon, France, 2012.
\*Award for [best student paper](http://aclweb.org/mirror/eacl2012/program/index.html)\* ## Dissertation **[Probabilistic Modelling of Morphologically Rich Languages](http://arxiv.org/abs/1508.04271)**
DPhil Dissertation, University of Oxford, 2014.
Supervisor: [Phil Blunsom](https://www.cs.ox.ac.uk/people/phil.blunsom/)
Examiners: [Nando de Freitas](https://www.cs.ox.ac.uk/people/nando.defreitas/), [Sharon Goldwater](http://homepages.inf.ed.ac.uk/sgwater/) ## ICML-2014 data To facilitate comparisons and development of future models, I have released the preprocessed version of the smaller monolingual dataset used for language modelling experiments in my ICML-2014 paper. The paper contains the aggregated perplexity numbers only; more detailled numbers can be found on page 74 of my dissertation. * [Download icml14-data.tar.bz2](https://github.com/bothameister/bothameister.github.io/raw/master/icml14-data.tar.bz2) (10MB, compressed) * See the readme for more details. * Thanks to [Yoon Kim](http://www.yoon.io) for encouraging this release. ## Contact ![email](http://safemail.justlikeed.net/e/c5d3a4fc670af84cbe5ef26f12a0b9ca.png)
